attributes.action: Support the election for Boris Johnson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ken Livingstone has become to settled in his role of Mayor and believes he 'owns' London.  It's time we supported Boris Johnson in his bid for the post of London Mayor.  Boris will remove the far left-wing liberal fascism peddled by Livingstone's administration and will establish a common sense approach to London politics.
